entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
